body_html:
Well, tensorflow_serving certainly uses it right now, but synced to a slightly older version that didn't have this issue. We also do it for an internal project at Snapchat.

I think there should be workaround in Tensorflow while Bazel doesn't fix that issue. The problem was introduced recently in Tensorflow.

body:
Well, tensorflow_serving certainly uses it right now, but synced to a slightly older version that didn't have this issue. We also do it for an internal project at Snapchat.

I think there should be workaround in Tensorflow while Bazel doesn't fix that issue. The problem was introduced recently in Tensorflow.
